00047 template<class TYPE> class AffxMultiDimensionalArray
00048 {
00049 private:

00051         int m_iXDimension;
00052         int m_iYDimension;
00053         int m_iZDimension;
00054

00056         static double infinity;
00057         TYPE* getPointer() {mustBeVector(); return m_ar;}
00058         int getXDimension() {return m_iXDimension;}
00059         int getYDimension() {return m_iYDimension;}
00060         int getZDimension() {return m_iZDimension;}
00061         void convertMatrixToVector() {m_iXDimension = m_iXDimension * m_iYDimension; m_iYDimension = 1;}
00062 
00063         int length() {return m_iXDimension;}
00064         bool isVector() {return ((m_iXDimension > 0) && (m_iYDimension == 1) && (m_iZDimension == 1));}
00065         bool isMatrix() {return ((m_iXDimension > 0) && (m_iYDimension > 1) && (m_iZDimension == 1));}

00077         }

00163         const AffxMultiDimensionalArray<TYPE>& operator=(AffxMultiDimensionalArray<TYPE>& that)
00164         {
00165                 if (this == &that) return that;
00166                 if (m_ar != 0)
00167                 {
00168                         delete[] m_ar;
00169                         m_ar = 0;
00170                 }
00171                 m_iXDimension = that.m_iXDimension;
00172                 m_iYDimension = that.m_iYDimension;
00173                 m_iZDimension = that.m_iZDimension;
00174                 m_ar = new TYPE[getCount()];
00175                 if (m_ar == NULL) {Err::errAbort("Run is out of memory.");}
00176                 memcpy(m_ar, that.m_ar, (getCount() * sizeof(TYPE)));   
00177                 return *this;

00197         static void defineInfinity()
00198         {
00199                 double d1 = 1.0;
00200                 double d2 = 0.0;        
00201                 infinity = (d1 / d2);
00202         }

00204         bool isAllInfinity()
00205         {
00206                 bool b = true;
00207                 for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < length()); iIndex++)
00208                 {
00209                         if (get(iIndex) != infinity)
00210                         {
00211                                 b = false;
00212                                 break;
00213                         }
00214                 }
00215                 return b;
00216         }

00218         int getCount()
00219         {
00220                 return (m_iXDimension * m_iYDimension * m_iZDimension);
00221         }

00223     int compareTo(AffxMultiDimensionalArray& that)
00224         {       
00225                 int iResult = 0;
00226                 int iLength = min(getCount(), that.getCount());
00227 
00228                 bool bEqual = true;
00229                 for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < iLength); iIndex++)
00230                 {
00231                         if (m_ar[iIndex] != that.m_ar[iIndex])
00232                         {
00233                                 bEqual = false;
00234                                 iResult = (m_ar[iIndex] - that.m_ar[iIndex]);
00235                                 break;
00236                         }
00237                 }
00238                 if (bEqual) {iResult = (getCount() - that.getCount());}
00239 
00240                 return iResult;
00241         }

00243         bool equals(AffxMultiDimensionalArray& that)
00244         {
00245                 bool bEquals = false;
00246                 if (getCount() == that.getCount())
00247                 {
00248                         for (int i = 0; (i < getCount()); i++)
00249                         {
00250                                 bEquals = true;
00251                                 if (m_ar[i] != that.m_ar[i])
00252                                 {
00253                                         bEquals = false;
00254                                         break;
00255                                 }
00256                         }
00257                 }
00258                 return bEquals;
00259         }

00302         {

00308         {
00309                 int iIndex = ((x * m_iYDimension * m_iZDimension) + (y * m_iZDimension) + z);
00310                 if ((iIndex < 0) || (iIndex >= getCount())) {Err::errAbort("AffxMultiDimensionalArray::get(x, y, z) index out of bounds. " + ::getInt(x) + ", " + ::getInt(y) + ", " + ::getInt(z));}
00311                 return m_ar[iIndex];

00314         void mustBeVector() 
00315         {
00316                 if (!isVector()) 
00317                 {
00318 //                      AffxLog::throwable(new Exception("AffxMultidimensionalArray function must operate on a vector."));
00319                 }
00320         }

00322         void insertAt(int x, TYPE t)
00323         {
00324                 mustBeVector();
00325                 AffxMultiDimensionalArray<TYPE> arTemp(*this);
00326                 if (m_ar != 0)
00327                 {
00328                         delete[] m_ar;
00329                         m_ar = 0;
00330                 }
00331                 m_iXDimension++;
00332                 m_ar = new TYPE[getCount()];
00333                 if (m_ar == NULL) {Err::errAbort("Run is out of memory.");}
00334                 initialize();
00335                 if (x > 0) {memcpy(m_ar, arTemp.getPointer(), (x * sizeof(TYPE)));}     
00336                 memcpy((m_ar + x), &t, sizeof(TYPE));
00337                 if (x < arTemp.length()) {memcpy((m_ar + x + 1), (arTemp.getPointer() + x), ((arTemp.length() - x) * sizeof(TYPE)));} 
00338         }
00339 
00340         void removeAt(int x)
00341         {
00342                 if (length() < 1) return;
00343                 mustBeVector();
00344                 if (x < (length() - 1))
00345                 {
00346                         memmove((m_ar + x), (m_ar + x + 1), ((m_iXDimension - x - 1) * sizeof(TYPE)));
00347                 }
00348                 m_iXDimension--;
00349         }

00351         AffxMultiDimensionalArray<TYPE> unique()
00352         {
00353                 mustBeVector();
00354                 AffxMultiDimensionalArray<TYPE> ar(*this);
00355                 for (int iIndex = 1; (iIndex < ar.length()); iIndex++)
00356                 {
00357                         for (int iIndex2 = 0; (iIndex2 < iIndex); iIndex2++)
00358                         {
00359                                 if (ar.get(iIndex) == ar.get(iIndex2)) 
00360                                 {
00361                                         ar.removeAt(iIndex); 
00362                                         iIndex--; 
00363                                         break;
00364                                 }
00365                         }
00366                 }
00367                 return ar;
00368         }

00370         AffxMultiDimensionalArray<TYPE> diff()
00371         {
00372                 mustBeVector();
00373 //              if (length() < 2) {AffxLog::throwable(new Exception("AffxMultidimensionalArray function diff(int) must operate on a vector with more than one element in it."));}
00374                 AffxMultiDimensionalArray<TYPE> ar(this->m_iXDimension - 1);
00375                 for (int iIndex = 1; (iIndex < length()); iIndex++)
00376                 {
00377                         ar.set((iIndex - 1), get(iIndex) - get(iIndex - 1));
00378                 }
00379                 return ar;
00380         }
00381 
00382         AffxMultiDimensionalArray<TYPE> rev()
00383         {
00384                 mustBeVector();
00385                 AffxMultiDimensionalArray<TYPE> ar(this->length());
00386                 for (int iIndex = (length() - 1); (iIndex >= 0); iIndex--)
00387                 {
00388                         ar.set(((length() - 1) - iIndex), get(iIndex));
00389                 }
00390                 return ar;
00391         }

00393         void calculatePointEstimates(double& dPointEstimate, double& dPointEstimateLower, double& dPointEstimateUpper)
00394         {
00395                 if (nonZeroLength() == 0) {dPointEstimate = 0.0; dPointEstimateLower = 0.0; dPointEstimateUpper = 0.0; return;}
00396                 if (mean() == 0.0) {dPointEstimate = 0.0; dPointEstimateLower = 0.0; dPointEstimateUpper = 0.0; return;}
00397                 else if (round(mean(), 4) == 1.0) {dPointEstimate = 1.0; dPointEstimateLower = 1.0; dPointEstimateUpper = 1.0; return;}
00398                 else
00399                 {
00400                         AffxMultiDimensionalArray<TYPE> ar(length());
00401                         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < ar.length()); iIndex++)
00402                         {
00403                                 double d = get(iIndex);
00404                                 if (d == 0.0) {d = d + 0.0001;}
00405                                 if (d == 1.0) {d = d - 0.0001;}
00406                                 ar.set(iIndex, log(d/(1-d)));
00407                         }
00408                         double dMean = ar.mean();
00409                         double dSd = ar.sd();
00410                         double dMeanUpper = dMean+2*dSd/sqrt((double)ar.length());
00411                         double dMeanLower = dMean-2*dSd/sqrt((double)ar.length());
00412 
00413                         dPointEstimateUpper = exp(dMeanUpper)/(1+exp(dMeanUpper));
00414                         dPointEstimate = exp(dMean)/(1+exp(dMean));
00415                         dPointEstimateLower = exp(dMeanLower)/(1+exp(dMeanLower));
00416                 }
00417         }
00418 
00419         int nonZeroLength()
00420         {
00421                 int iCount = 0;
00422                 for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < length()); iIndex++)
00423                 {
00424                         if (get(iIndex) != 0.0) {iCount++;}
00425                 }
00426                 return iCount;
00427         }
00428         
00429         double mean()
00430         {       
00431                 double dMean = 0.0;
00432                 mustBeVector();    
00433                 if (length() > 0)
00434             {
00435                 double dSum = 0.0;
00436                 for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < length()); iIndex++)
00437                 {
00438                     dSum += get(iIndex);
00439                 }
00440                         dMean = dSum / (double)length();
00441             }
00442                 return dMean;
00443         }
00444 
00445         double mean(int iLength)
00446         {       
00447                 double dMean = 0.0;
00448                 mustBeVector();    
00449                 if (iLength > 0)
00450             {
00451                 double dSum = 0.0;
00452                 for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < iLength); iIndex++)
00453                 {
00454                     dSum += get(iIndex);
00455                 }
00456                         dMean = dSum / (double)iLength;
00457             }
00458                 return dMean;
00459         }

00461         void logMean(bool bXDimension, bool bYDimension, AffxMultiDimensionalArray<TYPE>& vect)
00462         {
00463                 vect.initialize();
00464                 if ((!bXDimension) && (!bYDimension)) {return;}
00465 //              if ((bXDimension) && (bYDimension)) {AffxLog::throwable(new Exception("AffxMultidimensionalArray function must operate on a vector."));}
00466                 if (bXDimension)
00467                 {
00468 //                      if (vect.length() != m_iXDimension) {AffxLog::throwable(new Exception("AffxMultidimensionalArray function must operate on a vector of the appropriate size."));}
00469                         for (int iXIndex = 0; (iXIndex < m_iXDimension); iXIndex++)
00470                         {
00471                                 for (int iYIndex = 0; (iYIndex < m_iYDimension); iYIndex++)
00472                                 {
00473                                         vect.set(iXIndex, (TYPE)(vect.get(iXIndex) + log(get(iXIndex, iYIndex))));
00474                                 }
00475                         }               
00476                         for (int iXIndex = 0; (iXIndex < m_iXDimension); iXIndex++)
00477                         {
00478                                 vect.set(iXIndex, (vect.get(iXIndex) / m_iYDimension));
00479                         }
00480                 }               
00481                 else if (bYDimension)
00482                 {
00483 //                      if (vect.length() != m_iYDimension) {AffxLog::throwable(new Exception("AffxMultidimensionalArray function must operate on a vector of the appropriate size."));}
00484                         for (int iXIndex = 0; (iXIndex < m_iXDimension); iXIndex++)
00485                         {
00486                                 for (int iYIndex = 0; (iYIndex < m_iYDimension); iYIndex++)
00487                                 {
00488                                         vect.set(iYIndex, (TYPE)(vect.get(iYIndex) + log(get(iXIndex, iYIndex))));
00489                                 }
00490                         }               
00491                         for (int iYIndex = 0; (iYIndex < m_iYDimension); iYIndex++)
00492                         {
00493                                 vect.set(iYIndex, (vect.get(iYIndex) / m_iXDimension));
00494                         }
00495                 }
00496         }

00498         void logVar(bool bXDimension, bool bYDimension, AffxMultiDimensionalArray<TYPE>& vectMeans, AffxMultiDimensionalArray<TYPE>& vectVariances)
00499         {
00500                 vectMeans.initialize();
00501                 vectVariances.initialize();
00502                 if ((!bXDimension) && (!bYDimension)) {return;}
00503 //              if ((bXDimension) && (bYDimension)) {AffxLog::throwable(new Exception("AffxMultidimensionalArray function must operate on a vector."));}
00504                 if (bXDimension)
00505                 {
00506 //                      if (vectMeans.length() != m_iXDimension) {AffxLog::throwable(new Exception("AffxMultidimensionalArray function must operate on a vector of the appropriate size."));}
00507 //                      if (vectVariances.length() != m_iXDimension) {AffxLog::throwable(new Exception("AffxMultidimensionalArray function must operate on a vector of the appropriate size."));}
00508                         // Calculate Means.
00509                         for (int iXIndex = 0; (iXIndex < m_iXDimension); iXIndex++)
00510                         {
00511                                 for (int iYIndex = 0; (iYIndex < m_iYDimension); iYIndex++)
00512                                 {
00513                                         vectMeans.set(iXIndex, (TYPE)(vectMeans.get(iXIndex) + log(get(iXIndex, iYIndex))));
00514                                 }
00515                         }               
00516                         for (int iXIndex = 0; (iXIndex < m_iXDimension); iXIndex++)
00517                         {
00518                                 vectMeans.set(iXIndex, (vectMeans.get(iXIndex) / m_iYDimension));
00519                         }
00520                         // Calculate variances.
00521                         for (int iXIndex = 0; (iXIndex < m_iXDimension); iXIndex++)
00522                         {
00523                                 for (int iYIndex = 0; (iYIndex < m_iYDimension); iYIndex++)
00524                                 {
00525                                         vectVariances.set(iXIndex, (TYPE)(vectVariances.get(iXIndex) + ((log(get(iXIndex, iYIndex)) - vectMeans.get(iXIndex)) * (log(get(iXIndex, iYIndex)) - vectMeans.get(iXIndex)))));
00526                                 }
00527                         }               
00528                         for (int iXIndex = 0; (iXIndex < m_iXDimension); iXIndex++)
00529                         {
00530                                 vectVariances.set(iXIndex, (vectVariances.get(iXIndex) / (m_iYDimension - 1)));
00531                         }
00532                 }               
00533                 else if (bYDimension)
00534                 {
00535 //                      if (vectMeans.length() != m_iYDimension) {AffxLog::throwable(new Exception("AffxMultidimensionalArray function must operate on a vector of the appropriate size."));}
00536 //                      if (vectVariances.length() != m_iYDimension) {AffxLog::throwable(new Exception("AffxMultidimensionalArray function must operate on a vector of the appropriate size."));}
00537                         // Calculate Means.
00538                         for (int iXIndex = 0; (iXIndex < m_iXDimension); iXIndex++)
00539                         {
00540                                 for (int iYIndex = 0; (iYIndex < m_iYDimension); iYIndex++)
00541                                 {
00542                                         vectMeans.set(iYIndex, (TYPE)(vectMeans.get(iYIndex) + log(get(iXIndex, iYIndex))));
00543                                 }
00544                         }               
00545                         for (int iYIndex = 0; (iYIndex < m_iYDimension); iYIndex++)
00546                         {
00547                                 vectMeans.set(iYIndex, (vectMeans.get(iYIndex) / m_iXDimension));
00548                         }
00549                         // Calculate variances.
00550                         for (int iXIndex = 0; (iXIndex < m_iXDimension); iXIndex++)
00551                         {
00552                                 for (int iYIndex = 0; (iYIndex < m_iYDimension); iYIndex++)
00553                                 {
00554                                         vectVariances.set(iYIndex, (TYPE)(vectVariances.get(iYIndex) + ((log(get(iXIndex, iYIndex)) - vectMeans.get(iYIndex)) * (log(get(iXIndex, iYIndex)) - vectMeans.get(iYIndex)))));
00555                                 }
00556                         }               
00557                         for (int iYIndex = 0; (iYIndex < m_iYDimension); iYIndex++)
00558                         {
00559                                 vectVariances.set(iYIndex, (vectVariances.get(iYIndex) / (m_iXDimension - 1)));
00560                         }
00561                 }
00562         }

00564         double nonZeroMean()
00565         {       
00566                 double dMean = 0.0;
00567                 mustBeVector();    
00568                 if (length() > 0)
00569             {
00570                 double dSum = 0.0;
00571                         int iCount = 0;
00572                 for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < length()); iIndex++)
00573                 {
00574                                 if (get(iIndex) != 0)
00575                                 {
00576                                         dSum += get(iIndex);
00577                                         iCount++;
00578                                 }
00579                 }
00580                         if (iCount == 0) {dMean = 0.0;} else {dMean = dSum / (double)iCount;}
00581             }
00582                 return dMean;
00583         }
00584 
00585         double sd()
00586         {       
00587                 double dStandardDeviation = 0.0;
00588                 double dMean = mean();
00589                 mustBeVector();    
00590                 if (length() > 1)
00591             {
00592                 double dSumOfSquares = 0.0;
00593                 for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < length()); iIndex++)
00594                 {
00595                     dSumOfSquares += ((get(iIndex) - dMean) * (get(iIndex) - dMean));
00596                 }
00597                         dStandardDeviation = sqrt(dSumOfSquares / (length() - 1));
00598             }
00599                 return dStandardDeviation;
00600         }

00608             {
00609                 double dSumOfSquares = 0.0;
00610                 for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < length()); iIndex++)
00611                 {
00612                     dSumOfSquares += ((get(iIndex) - dMean) * (get(iIndex) - dMean));
00613                 }
00614                         dVariance = dSumOfSquares / (length() - 1);
00615             }

00620         {

00622                 double dMean = mean(iLength);
00623                 mustBeVector();    
00624                 if (iLength > 1)
00625             {
00626                 double dSumOfSquares = 0.0;
00627                 for (int iIndex = 0; iIndex < iLength; iIndex++)
00628                 {
00629                     dSumOfSquares += ((get(iIndex) - dMean) * (get(iIndex) - dMean));
00630                 }
00631                         dVariance = dSumOfSquares / (iLength - 1);
00632             }
00633                 return dVariance;

00636 
00637         double corr()
00638         {
00639                 if (getYDimension() != 2 ) {return std::numeric_limits<double>::quiet_NaN();}
00640                 int iLength = getXDimension();
00641                 double dSum = 0;
00642                 for (int iElementIndex = 0; (iElementIndex < iLength); iElementIndex++)
00643                 {
00644                         dSum += get(iElementIndex, 0);
00645                 }
00646                 double m1 = (dSum / (double)iLength);
00647                 dSum = 0;
00648                 for (int iElementIndex = 0; (iElementIndex < iLength); iElementIndex++)
00649                 {
00650                         dSum += get(iElementIndex, 1);
00651                 }
00652                 double m2 = (dSum / (double)iLength);
00653                 double dNumerator = 0;
00654                 double d1 = 0;;
00655                 double d2 = 0;
00656                 for (int iElementIndex = 0; (iElementIndex < iLength); iElementIndex++)
00657                 {
00658                         dNumerator += (get(iElementIndex, 0) - m1) * (get(iElementIndex, 1) - m2);
00659                         d1 += (get(iElementIndex, 0) - m1) * (get(iElementIndex, 0) - m1) ;
00660                         d2 += (get(iElementIndex, 1) - m2) * (get(iElementIndex, 1) - m2) ;
00661                 }
00662 //              double dDenominator = sqrt(d1 * d2);
00663                 return dNumerator / sqrt(d1) / sqrt(d2);
00664         }

00670                 {
00671                         TYPE t = get(iIndex);
00672                         int x = 0;
00673                 }
00674         }
00675         
00676         void quickSort() {mustBeVector(); quickSort(0, (length() - 1), 0);}
00677         void quickSort(int iFrom, int iTo, int iCompareCode)
00678     {
00679         if ((m_ar != NULL) && (length() >= 2))
00680         {
00681                     TYPE objCenter = 0;
00682             int i = iFrom;
00683             int j = iTo;
00684                     objCenter = get((iFrom + iTo) / 2);
00685             do
00686             {
00687                 while ((i < iTo) && (objCenter > get(i))) i++;
00688                 while ((j > iFrom) && (objCenter < get(j))) j--;
00689                 if (i < j) {swap(i, j);}
00690                 if (i <= j)
00691                 {
00692                     i++;
00693                     j--;
00694                 }
00695             } while (i <= j);
00696 
00697             if (iFrom < j) {quickSort(iFrom, j, iCompareCode);}
00698             if (i < iTo) {quickSort(i, iTo, iCompareCode);}
00699             objCenter = 0;
00700         }
00701     }
00702 
00703     void swap(int iIndex1, int iIndex2)
00704     {
00705                 TYPE temp = get(iIndex1);
00706                 set(iIndex1, get(iIndex2));
00707                 set(iIndex2, temp);
00708     }

00710         double percentile(double dPercentile, bool bSort = true)
00711         {
00712                 if (length() == 0) {return numeric_limits<double>::quiet_NaN();}
00713                 double d = 0.0;
00714                 mustBeVector();
00715                 if (bSort) {quickSort();}
00716                 double dIndex = ((length() - 1) * dPercentile);
00717                 double dMultiplier = dIndex - floor(dIndex);
00718                 d = get((int)floor(dIndex)) + ((get((int)ceil(dIndex)) - get((int)floor(dIndex))) * dMultiplier);
00719                 return d;
00720         }

00724                 if (iLength == 0) {return numeric_limits<double>::quiet_NaN();}
00725                 double d = 0.0;
00726                 mustBeVector();
00727                 if (bSort) {quickSort(0, (iLength - 1), 0);}
00728                 double dIndex = ((iLength - 1) * dPercentile);
00729                 double dMultiplier = dIndex - floor(dIndex);
00730                 d = get((int)floor(dIndex)) + ((get((int)ceil(dIndex)) - get((int)floor(dIndex))) * dMultiplier);
00731                 return d;
00732         }

00734         double finiteMedian()
00735         {
00736                 mustBeVector();
00737                 vector<double> finiteNumbers;
00738                 for(int i = 0; i < this->length(); i++) 
00739                 {
00740                   double d = (double) get(i);
00741                   if(Util::isFinite(d)) 
00742                   {
00743                     finiteNumbers.push_back(d);
00744                   }
00745                 }
00746                 if (finiteNumbers.empty()) {return numeric_limits<double>::quiet_NaN();}
00747                 double med = median_in_place(finiteNumbers.begin(),finiteNumbers.end());
00748                 return med;
00749         }

00752         double median()
00753         {
00754                 if (length() == 0) {return numeric_limits<double>::quiet_NaN();}
00755                 double d = 0.0;
00756                 mustBeVector();
00757 //              AffxMultiDimensionalArray<TYPE> ar(this->length());
00758 //              for (int iIndex = (length() - 1); (iIndex >= 0); iIndex--)
00759 //              {
00760 //                      ar.set(((length() - 1) - iIndex), get(iIndex));
00761 //              }
00762                 quickSort();
00763                 if ((length() % 2) == 0)
00764                 {
00765                         d = get((int)((double)length() / 2.0) - 1) + ((double)(get((int)((double)length() / 2.0)) - get((int)((double)length() / 2.0) - 1)) / 2.0);
00766                 }
00767                 else
00768                 {
00769                         d = get((int)floor((double)length() / 2.0));
00770                 }
00771                 return d;
00772         }

00774         double median(int iLength)
00775         {
00776                 if (iLength == 0) {return numeric_limits<double>::quiet_NaN();}
00777                 double d = 0.0;
00778                 mustBeVector();
00779                 quickSort(0, (iLength - 1), 0);
00780                 if ((iLength % 2) == 0)
00781                 {
00782                         d = get((int)((double)iLength / 2.0) - 1) + ((double)(get((int)((double)iLength / 2.0)) - get((int)((double)iLength / 2.0) - 1)) / 2.0);
00783                 }
00784                 else
00785                 {
00786                         d = get((int)floor((double)iLength / 2.0));
00787                 }
00788                 return d;
00789         }

00791         static int readVectorSize(const AffxString& strFileName, bool bHeader)
00792         {
00793                 AffxFile file;
00794                 AffxByteArray baLine;
00795                 AffxByteArray baColumn;
00796                 int iCount = 0;
00797                 if (file.open(strFileName, AffxFile::LOAD))
00798                 {
00799                         if (bHeader) {file.readLine(baLine);}
00800                         while (file.readLine(baLine)) {iCount++;}
00801                         file.close();
00802                 } else {return 0;}
00803                 return iCount;
00804         }

00806         bool readVector(const AffxString& strFileName, bool bHeader)
00807         {
00808                 try
00809                 {
00810                 AffxFile file;
00811                 AffxByteArray baLine;
00812                 AffxByteArray baColumn;
00813                 int iCount = 0;
00814                 if (file.open(strFileName, AffxFile::LOAD))
00815                 {
00816                         if (bHeader) {file.readLine(baLine);}
00817                         while (file.readLine(baLine)) {set(iCount, baLine.getColumn(1, baColumn).trim().parseDouble()); iCount++;}
00818                         file.close();
00819                 } else {return false;}
00820                 return true;
00821                 } catch(...) {return false;}
00822         }

00855         bool readMatrixXHeader(const AffxString& strFileName, bool bRowHeader, AffxArray<AffxString>& ar)
00856         {
00857                 ar.deleteAll();

00859                 AffxByteArray baLine;
00860                 AffxByteArray baColumn;

00862                 if (file.open(strFileName, AffxFile::LOAD))
00863                 {
00864                         if (file.readLine(baLine)) 
00865                         {
00866                                 int iColumnCount = baLine.getColumnCount();
00867                                 int iColumnNumber = 1;
00868                                 if (bRowHeader) {iColumnNumber++;}
00869                                 for (; (iColumnNumber <= iColumnCount); iColumnNumber++)
00870                                 {
00871                                         ar.add(new AffxString(baLine.getColumn(iColumnNumber, baColumn).trim().toString()));
00872                                 }
00873                                 iCount++;
00874                         }
00875                         file.close();
00876                 } else {return false;}
00877                 return true;
00878         }

00901         bool readMatrix(const AffxString& strFileName, bool bColHeader, bool bRowHeader, int iColumnCount)
00902         {
00903                 try
00904                 {
00905                 AffxFile file;
00906                 AffxByteArray baLine;
00907                 AffxByteArray baColumn;
00908                 int iCount = 0;
00909                 if (bRowHeader) {iColumnCount++;}
00910                 if (file.open(strFileName, AffxFile::LOAD))
00911                 {
00912                         if (bColHeader) {file.readLine(baLine);}
00913                         while (file.readLine(baLine)) 
00914                         {
00915                                 int iColumnNumber = 1;
00916                                 if (bRowHeader) {iColumnNumber++;}
00917                                 int iColIndex = 0;
00918                                 for (; (iColumnNumber <= iColumnCount); iColumnNumber++)
00919                                 {
00920                                         set(iColIndex, iCount, baLine.getColumn(iColumnNumber, baColumn).trim().parseDouble());
00921                                         iColIndex++;
00922                                 }
00923                                 iCount++;
00924                         }
00925                         file.close();
00926                 } else {return false;}
00927                 return true;
00928                 } catch(...) {return false;}
00929         }
00930 
00931         int binarySearch(TYPE& obj)
00932         {
00933             int iSearchIndex = -1;
00934                 int iLow = 0;
00935                 int iHigh = m_iXDimension - 1;
00936                 int iMid = 0;
00937                 int iCompareResult = 0;
00938 
00939                 while (iLow <= iHigh)
00940                 {
00941                         iMid = (iLow + iHigh) / 2;
00942                         iCompareResult = AffxArray<TYPE>::compare(obj, get(iMid));
00943                         if (iCompareResult < 0)
00944                         {
00945                                 iHigh = iMid - 1;
00946                         }
00947                         else if (iCompareResult > 0)
00948                         {
00949                                 iLow = iMid + 1;
00950                         }
00951                         else
00952                         {
00953                                 iSearchIndex = iMid;
00954                                 break;
00955                         }
00956                 }
00957 
00958                 return iSearchIndex;
00959         }
00960 
00961         int binarySearch(TYPE obj, unsigned int& uiLowIndex, unsigned int& uiHighIndex)
00962         {
00963             int iSearchIndex = -1;
00964                 if (obj < get(0)) {uiLowIndex = uiHighIndex = 0; return -1;}
00965                 if (obj > get(m_iXDimension - 1)) {uiLowIndex = uiHighIndex = (m_iXDimension + 1); return -1;}
00966 
00967                 int iMid = 0;
00968                 int iLow = 0;
00969                 int iHigh = m_iXDimension - 1;
00970                 int iCompareResult = 0;
00971 
00972                 while (iLow <= iHigh)
00973                 {
00974                         iMid = (iLow + iHigh) / 2;
00975                         iCompareResult = AffxArray<TYPE>::compare(obj, get(iMid));
00976                         if (iCompareResult < 0)
00977                         {
00978                                 iHigh = iMid - 1;
00979                         }
00980                         else if (iCompareResult > 0)
00981                         {
00982                                 iLow = iMid + 1;
00983                         }
00984                         else
00985                         {
00986                                 iSearchIndex = iMid;
00987                                 break;
00988                         }
00989                 }
00990                 // Set boundries where get(uiLowIndex) <= n <=  get(uiHighIndex)
00991                 uiLowIndex = uiHighIndex = iMid;
00992                 if (get(uiLowIndex) == obj)
00993                 {
00994                         while ((uiLowIndex > 0) && (get(uiLowIndex - 1) == obj)) {uiLowIndex--;}
00995                         while ((uiHighIndex < (m_iXDimension - 1)) && (obj == get(uiHighIndex + 1))) {uiHighIndex++;} 
00996                 }
00997                 else
00998                 {
00999                         while ((uiLowIndex > 0) && (get(uiLowIndex) > obj)) {uiLowIndex--;}
01000                         while ((uiHighIndex < (m_iXDimension - 1)) && (obj > get(uiHighIndex))) {uiHighIndex++;} 
01001                 }
01002 
01003                 return iSearchIndex;
01004         }
01005 
01006         double regress()
01007         {
01008                 double dSlope = 0;
01009                 double dIntercept = 0;
01010                 double dXCoefficient = 0;
01011         double dSumX = 0.0;
01012         double dSumXsq = 0.0;
01013         double dSumY = 0.0;
01014         double dSumYsq = 0.0;
01015         double dSumXY = 0.0;
01016         double dMaxX = -99999;
01017         double dMaxY = -99999;
01018         double x = 0.0;
01019         double y = 0.0;
01020         double xSq = 0.0;
01021         double ySq = 0.0;
01022 
01023         for(int i = 0; (i < getXDimension()); ++i)
01024         {
01025             x = get(i, 0);
01026             y = get(i, 1);
01027             xSq = x * x;
01028             ySq = y * y;
01029             dSumX += x;
01030             dSumXsq += xSq;
01031             dSumY += y;
01032             dSumYsq += ySq;
01033             dSumXY += (x * y);
01034                         dMaxX = Max(x, dMaxX);
01035                         dMaxY = Max(y, dMaxY);
01036         }
01037         double dSlopeNumerator = 0.0;
01038         double dSlopeDenomenator = 0.0;
01039 
01040         dSlopeNumerator = (getXDimension() * dSumXY) - (dSumX * dSumY);
01041         dSlopeDenomenator = (getXDimension() * dSumXsq) - (dSumX * dSumX);
01042 
01043         if ((dSlopeDenomenator <= 0) || (getXDimension() <= 2))
01044         {
01045                         return numeric_limits<double>::quiet_NaN();
01046         }
01047 
01048                 dSlope = dSlopeNumerator / dSlopeDenomenator;
01049         dIntercept = (dSumY - (dSlope * dSumX)) / getXDimension();
01050                 double dSxSq = (dSumXsq - (dSumXsq / getXDimension())) / (getXDimension() - 1);
01051             double dSySq = (dSumYsq - (dSumYsq / getXDimension())) / (getXDimension() - 1);
01052             dXCoefficient = dSlope * (sqrt(dSxSq) / sqrt(dSySq));
01053         return dSlope;
01054         }
01055 };

01057 template <class TYPE> double AffxMultiDimensionalArray<TYPE>::infinity;
01058 
01059 #endif
